ns1:typeA.ns1:paramA: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/TestSystemFault/AnotherService}userFault; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://j2ee.netbeans.org/wsdl/TestSystemFault/AnotherService" type="msgns:AnotherServiceOperationResponse" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>In Fault handler: BPCOR-6177: attempt to access the value of an uninitialized variable "Variable1"</jbi:part></jbi:message>. Sending errors for the pending requests in the process scope before terminating the process instance
